alert.note: Alert for Snowy Range, Medicine Bow NF (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 08 at 7:47AM MDT until September 08 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR MUCH OF SOUTHEAST WYOMING AND THE NEBRASKA PANHANDLE TODAY DUE TO GUSTY WEST WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WEST WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 426... The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect until 7 PM MDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zone 426. * WIND...West to northwest winds 15 to 25 mph sustained with gusts to 40 mph possible. * HUMIDITY...12 to 15 percent. * HAINES...5 to 6. * THUNDERSTORMS...Isolated dry thunderstorms are likely Thursday afternoon leading to additional fire starts. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
